/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy over the road. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
